bio: Inquisitive about DeFi, research and analytics, Mathematics - Love numbers and creating use case research
contributionDescription:
Hi,

I worked for Optimism as a nerd for few weeks and couldn't continue for some reason though i would love to contribute for significant amount of time.

PG was as much a community as an organization. We hosted monthly calls, ran conferences, and shared new designs for implementers to adopt.

But plasma was missing something, and we began to search for something new.

Something better.

pwCategorySuggestions: Web3 Community Platform, Research and Analytics, Developer Ecosystem
pwFlaggedReason: Flag the application for the violation of rule 2 (False statements & deception) and rule 10 (Outside of RetroPGF's scope). The applicant did not provide specific details or proof about their alleged work for Optimism and their contribution seems vague and out of scope.
